casebody.data:
SPELL
v.
GHANEM, et al. No. 67P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. O. William Faison, John W. Jensen, Kristen L. Beightol, Durham, for Estate of Spell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of February *1882006 by Defendant (East Carolina Health Herritae) to Withdraw Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
